original_solution_mapping.L1: There are 60 minutes in an hour.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Micah can type 20 x 60 = <<20*60=1200>>1200 words in an hour.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<2400=2400>>2400 words in an hour.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Isaiah can type 2400 - 1200 = <<2400-1200=1200>>1200 words more than Micah in an hour.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1372.
    Returns: how many more words Isaiah can type than Micah in an hour.
    """
    # L2
    micah_wpm = 20 # 20 words per minute
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    micah_wph = micah_wpm * minutes_per_hour

    # L3
    isaiah_wpm = 40 # 40 words per minute
    isaiah_wph = isaiah_wpm * minutes_per_hour

    # L4
    difference_in_words = isaiah_wph - micah_wph

    # FA
    answer = difference_in_words
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Micah can type {micah_wpm} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{micah_wpm}*{minutes_per_hour}={micah_wph}>>{micah_wph} words in an hour.
Isaiah can type {isaiah_wpm} x {minutes_per_hour} = <<{isaiah_wph}={isaiah_wph}>>{isaiah_wph} words in an hour.
Isaiah can type {isaiah_wph} - {micah_wph} = <<{isaiah_wph}-{micah_wph}={difference_in_words}>>{difference_in_words} words more than Micah in an hour.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Isaiah can type 40 x 60 = <<2400=2400>>2400 words in an hour.
